title: A Knowledge-enhanced Pathology Vision-language Foundation Model for Cancer Diagnosis
details: X Zhou, L Sun, D He, W Guan, R Wang, L Wang, X Sun… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Deep learning has enabled the development of highly robust foundation models for various pathological tasks across diverse diseases and patient cohorts. Among these models, vision-language pre-training, which leverages large-scale paired data to …
